S.FORM: == pacing == minbuqax na knus hiya' ga, hbkgan na pacing. mstmah qu baruh lga, hbkgan na pacing la.
== pacing == minboqax na knos hiya' ga, hbkgan na pacing. mstmah qo baroh lga, hbkgan na pacing la.
